thread.title: Avengers: Infinity War Video Gives Us A Tease Of Thor And Rocket Raccoon Together - CINEMABLEND
thread.title_full: Avengers: Infinity War Video Gives Us A Tease Of Thor And Rocket Raccoon Together - CINEMABLEND

author: Eric Eisenberg
title: Avengers: Infinity War Video Gives Us A Tease Of Thor And Rocket Raccoon Together - CINEMABLEND
text:
By Eric Eisenberg 13 minutes ago 
Marvel has spent years teasing the prospect of seeing their two biggest superhero teams on the big screen together - and I am of course referring to The Avengers and the Guardians of the Galaxy. Because The Avengers: Infinity War only recently started production, that footage sadly doesn't exist yet, but this brand new video does give us a quick taste, specifically with Rocket Raccoon and Thor fighting back to back. Check it out! â€” Marvel Studios (@MarvelStudios) February 11, 2017 
As you can surely tell this video comes to us from the official Marvel Studios Twitter feed, and features footage that will be included within a new featurette that will be included on the upcoming Blu-ray for Doctor Strange . And just so you don't have to do it yourself, you can check out a screenshot of the amazing concept art below:
